p: COVID-19 Literature Management: Finally, other machine learning tools developed can indirectly help researchers and the public fight the pandemic. Covidscholar is a text-mining website aimed at synthesizing a huge amount of scientific literature on COVID-19 using neuro-linguistic programming (NLP) to automate search. This is helpful because more than 200 new journal articles are being published every day on the coronavirus. A simple search for a “rapid test” in Covidscholar provided organized and classified data that can greatly expedite COVID-19 research ( Figure 5e).
